pullRequest.title: Create a task factory to create the tasks for black duck provider

commit.message: refactor(tasks): Create a task factory to create the tasks for black duck.

nodes.bodyText: We want to get rid of the getter/setter for properties and pass them in through the constructor.
This doesn't seem to have the properties set at all.
I think validateProviderProperties and invalidateProviderProperties should also be deleted now.

commit.message: refactor(task): Remove validate and invalidate methods.
